N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1003.8 - Predetermined interval payments

State Regulations
A proper invoice submitted by the contractor will be required
to initiate any payment by the Fund, except where the contract provides that
the contractor will be paid at pre-determined intervals without having to
submit an invoice for each such scheduled payment. For the purpose of
determining eligibility for payment of interest and subject to the provisions
of sections 1003.5 and
1003.6
of this Part, the date by
which contract payment must be made in order for the Fund to be liable for
interest payments will be the payment due date specified in the
contract. Notes
